title: chati.dev Memory Entry
description: Schema for memory entry YAML frontmatter in .chati/memories/

type.description: Classification of what this memory captures

agent.description: Agent that created or owns this memory

tags.description: Searchable tags for similarity matching and retrieval

sector.description: Cognitive sector: episodic (what happened), semantic (what we know), procedural (how to do it), reflective (what we learned)

tier.description: Attention tier: hot (>0.7, auto-loaded), warm (0.3-0.7, on-demand), cold (<0.3, explicit search)

access_count.description: Number of times this memory has been accessed

storage_tier.description: Storage persistence: session (cleaned on restart), daily (archived after 30d), durable (permanent)

scope.description: Visibility: shared (all agents) or private (owning agent only)
